title: Constructivist Social Education Simulation Based on Reinforcement Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science concepts and adaptability to digital environments
context.additional_context: A VR simulation environment using personal devices (BYOD), enhancing problem-solving competencies for societal issues through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can simulate decision-making in virtual social environments by applying reinforcement learning principles
Learners can autonomously design community problem-solving projects through a constructivist approach
Learners can evaluate causal relationships in social interactions by analyzing VR-based feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
